wikitext.*:
'''The Road Goes Ever On''' can refer to:
==Poems==
* "[[The Road Goes Ever On (song)]]", a walking song featured in both ''[[The Hobbit]]'' and ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]''.
==Books==
* ''[[The Road Goes Ever On (book)|The Road Goes Ever On, A Song Cycle]]'', a book containing a set of poems by [[J.R.R. Tolkien|Tolkien]] set to music by [[Donald Swann]].
* ''[[The Road Goes Ever On and On: The Map of Tolkien's Middle-earth]]'', a book by [[Brian Sibley]] and [[John Howe]].
==Adaptations==
* "[[The Road Goes Ever On... (scene)]]", the last scene of both the theatrical and extended editions of ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring]]''.
* "[[Roads (song)]]", an adaptation of the song, sung by [[Glenn Yarbrough]] and published on ''[[The Hobbit: The Complete Original Soundtrack]]''.
* "[[Roads Go Ever, Ever On]]", an adaptation of the song from the [[1980]] film ''[[The Return of the King (1980 film)|The Return of the King]]'' by [[Arthur Rankin, Jr.]] and [[Jules Bass]].

==Popular media==
* "[[Mountain Live: The Road Goes Ever On]]", an album by [[Mountain]].
